tweet: Just don't know how a TV exec can think Millen has any credibility with #NFL viewers. Like having Keanu Reeves as your acting coach.
#Packers fans have to love #Broncos beating #Giants. Really a boost to Green Bay's playoff hopes. Good day for Cheeseheads.
Question from my wife: "I wonder if on Thanksgiving, do they sell turkey at the games?"
Off to Thanksgiving dinner at a friend's house. Didn't expect this to still be a game by the time I arrived. That's what I get for thinking.
Ultra props, by the way, to Charles Woodson. Not for his play, but for his $2M donation to a Michigan children's hospital. #Packers #Lions
